annotations.description: If you like Pi√±a Coladas... you'll LOVE a Painkiller. Most of America partied a bit too hard last night and is in pain, so drink these. *********************...
annotations.title: A Drink from Paradise, the Painkiller | How to Drink

textContent:
1 oz. -or- 30 ml. Orange Juice
1 oz. -or- 30 ml. Cream of Coconut
4 oz. -or- 240 ml. Pineapple juice
2 oz. -or- 60 ml. Rum

Shake over ice and open pour into double rocks
garnish with fresh nutmeg

title: Painkiller
